ocr.name: Space Elevator Lab
ocr.description: PLUTO-CHARON ELEVATOR - Pluto and its moon Charon are tidally locked. A tether between the two stretches 17,800 km.
ocr.rawText: Your factory-assisted landings/liftoffs anywhere treat lander burns as normal Burn Spaces.
ocr.ability: Your factory-assisted landings/liftoffs anywhere treat lander burns as normal Burn Spaces.

ocr.name: GEO Elevator Bernal
ocr.description: SPACE ELEVATOR - Centripedal force holds the elevator cable vertical over its anchorage.
ocr.rawText: Bernal SPACE ELEVATOR 10 MASS 6 Rad-Hard HOME: Boost direct to Home Bernal in GEO without doubling boost costs. Time to GEO: 7.5 days Power: 4 MW (beamed) Climber Mass: 20 Mtonne
ocr.ability: HOME: Boost direct to Home Bernal without doubling boost costs.

ocr.name: Climate Control Lab
ocr.description: L1 MOIRE LENS SUNSHADE - A concave rotating Fresnel lens diverts sunlight to or from a planet for climate engineering.
ocr.rawText: +2 VP per Dirtside for this Bernal.
ocr.ability: +2 VP per Dirtside for this Bernal.

ocr.name: L1 Climate Control Bernal
ocr.description: L1 SPACE MIRROR SWARM - A swarm of sail-mirrors in the Sol-Earth L1 Lagrange to divert sunlight for climate engineering.
ocr.rawText: HOME: You are always the 1st player, superseding all other claimants.
ocr.ability: HOME: You are always the 1st player, superseding all other claimants.

ocr.name: Collimator Lab
ocr.description: DYSON SWARM POWERSATS - A power-beaming swarm of thousands of sun-fired lasers in inclined orbits.
ocr.rawText: Gain the Powersat faction privilege. Powersat push includes a Bonus Pivot.
ocr.ability: Gain the Powersat faction privilege. Powersat push includes a Bonus Pivot.

ocr.name: L2 Collimator Bernal
ocr.description: OPTICAL TELESCOPE - Shown is one of many in a precision formation located in the Earth-Luna L2 point.
ocr.rawText: HOME: Gain the Powersat faction privilege.
ocr.ability: HOME: Gain the Powersat faction privilege.

ocr.name: Lofstrom Loop Microgravity Lab
ocr.description: MASS DRIVER PROPULSION - Equipped with an electromagnetic railgun, a Bernal sacrifices its own dirt shielding for thrust.
ocr.rawText: Your factory-assisted landings/liftoffs anywhere treat lander burns as normal Burn Spaces.
ocr.ability: Your factory-assisted landings/liftoffs anywhere treat lander burns as normal Burn Spaces.

ocr.name: L3 Lofstrom Loop Microgravity
ocr.description: LAUNCH LOOP - Accelerates humans & cargos to escape velocity.
ocr.rawText: HOME: Boost direct to Home Bernal without doubling boost costs.
ocr.ability: HOME: Boost direct to Home Bernal without doubling boost costs.

ocr.name: Antimatter Lab
ocr.description: BERNAL SPHERE - A sphere is optimal for air pressure maintenance and minimal radiation shielding.
ocr.rawText: Your Crew has an On-Board Nuclear Any reactor.
ocr.ability: Your Crew has an On-Board Nuclear "ANY" reactor.

ocr.name: L4 Antimatter Factory
ocr.description: LINAC Amat Factory - Cascading debris from a proton beam target are sorted to extract isotope fuels, then positrons and antiprotons.
ocr.rawText: HOME: Your Crew has an On-Board Nuclear Any reactor.
ocr.ability: HOME: Your Crew has an On-Board Nuclear X reactor.

ocr.name: Pharmaceutics Lab
ocr.description: PHARMING BEADED TORUS - Breeds neogenic organelles that function to reverse human disorders arising from radiation and weightlessness. Pharm Module Diameter: 100m, Inhabitants: 48
ocr.rawText: Gain the Skunkworks faction privilege & impose academia hand limit on all opponents.
ocr.ability: Gain the Skunkworks faction privilege & impose academia hand limit on all opponents.

ocr.name: L4s Pharmaceutics Bernal
ocr.description: BOLO HABITAT - A dumbell geometry minimizes hull mass, although more shielding mass is needed. Mass: 17t (hull), 7t (air), Rotation: 3 rpm, Inhabitants: 15
ocr.rawText: HOME: Gain the Skunkworks faction privilege.
ocr.ability: HOME: Gain the Skunkworks faction privilege.

ocr.name: Solar Cell Lab
ocr.description: SUN-FIRED WPT POWER BEAM - A bio-mimetic array of solar concentrators generating microwave power. WPT Frequency: 2.45 GHz, Power: 500 MWbeam, Efficiency: 34%, Mass: 12 ktonnes
ocr.rawText: +2 to the Net Thrust of your Spacecraft that use Solar-Power.
ocr.ability: +2 to the Net Thrust of your Spacecraft that use Solar-Power.

ocr.name: L5 Solar Cell Factory
ocr.description: SOLAR CELL FACTORY - Photovoltaic cells are conveyed through vapor deposition sections, then cut and integrated into panels and arrays. Length: 400m, Power: 240 MWe, Throughput: 14 ktons/yr, Inhabitants: 110
ocr.rawText: HOME: +1 to the Net Thrust of your Spacecraft that use Solar-Power.
ocr.ability: HOME: +1 to the Net Thrust of your Spacecraft that use Solar-Power.

ocr.name: Cancer Lab
ocr.description: STANFORD TORUS - Primary and secondary mirrors direct sunlight into the interior. Radius: 56m (major), 7m (minor), Mass: 80t (hull), 60t (air), Rotation: 4 rpm, Inhabitants: 123
ocr.rawText: Gain +1 Token VP for each Colony Dome. Your Crew and Human Colonists have a rad-hard of at least 7.
ocr.ability: Gain +1 Token VP for each Colony Dome. Your Crew and Human Colonists have a rad-hard of at least 7.

ocr.name: L5s Cancer Hospital
ocr.description: NAUTILUS-X - Parked in a Lagrange point for long duration missions. Uses a centrifuge for the investigation of microgravity on human health. Crew: 6
ocr.rawText: HOME: You are immune to budget cuts.
ocr.ability: HOME: You are immune to budget cuts.

ocr.name: Diplomatic Lab
ocr.description: O'NEIL SUNFLOWER - Twin cylinders rotate about their center of gravity. The mirrors admit sunlight without allowing cosmic rays to bypass the shielded area. Rotation: 2 rpm, Cylinder Diameter: 1 km
ocr.rawText: (Module 0) Your delegates in the assembly are +1 VP each.
ocr.ability: (Module 0) Your delegates in the assembly are +1 VP each.

ocr.name: SSO Diplomatic
ocr.description: INTERNATIONAL SPACE STATION - A habitat in LEO, launched 1998. Mass: 420 tonnes (Mass 10), Length: 51m, Inhabitants: 6
ocr.rawText: HOME: (Module 0) Your delegates in the Ideology of your Faction color are +1 VP each.
ocr.ability: HOME: (Module 0) Your delegates in the Ideology of your Faction color are +1 VP each.

ocr.name: Tourism Hotel
ocr.description: MCKENDREE CYLINDER - Similar to an O'Neill Cylinder, but using carbon nanotube construction instead of steel. Cylinder: 70m long, 70m dia, Inhabitants: 700
ocr.rawText: +2 VP per Dirtside for this Bernal.
ocr.ability: +2 VP per Dirtside for this Bernal.

ocr.name: Tourism Cycler
ocr.description: 2:1 RESONANCE CYCLER - Kalpana cylinder passes monthly through the VAB as it cycles between Earth and Luna. Cylinder: 56m long, 56m dia, Unshielded Mass: 8.5 ktonnes, Hull Mass: 500 tonnes, Rotation: 4 rpm, Inhabitants: 490
ocr.rawText: HOME: Can designate any Spacecraft to forgo Belt Rolls in the Radiation Belts near Earth.
ocr.ability: HOME: Can designate any Spacecraft to forgo Belt Rolls in the Radiation Belts near Earth.

ocr.name: Force Field Lab
ocr.description: Military grade active shielding to protect ionized particles from solar wind using superconducting magnets forming a Langevin field.
ocr.rawText: Bernal 10 MASS 10 Rad-Hard S HOME: Gain the Powersat refuel priv. Military grade active shielding Force Field Lab

ocr.name: L2 Force Field Bernal
ocr.description: Intended for protection against low-energy ions on either side of the solar wind behind charged plasma windows.
ocr.rawText: Bernal 10 MASS 10 Rad-Hard S HOME: Gain the Powersat refuel priv. L2 Force Field Bernal

ocr.name: Catcher's Mitt Lab
ocr.description: CATCHER'S MITT - High per-word cost to repurpose orbital node for chemical or rail launch from LEO to cislunar sites.
ocr.rawText: Bernal 10 MASS 6 Rad-Hard E HOME: Gain the Powersat refuel priv. Catcher's Mitt Lab

ocr.name: Catcher's Mitt Bernal
ocr.description: CATCHER'S MITT - Clean Space One concept for orbital debris removal and recycling. Mass: 420 tonnes, Length: 40m, Inhabitants: 4
ocr.rawText: Bernal 10 MASS 6 Rad-Hard E HOME: Gain the Powersat refuel priv. Catcher's Mitt Bernal

ocr.name: Babbage Halbonauts
ocr.description: A Halbonaut is guided by a HAL Turing or other central controller. Its Babbage circuitry, (mechanical analogs of electronic transistors) withstands high radiation and temperature.

ocr.name: Utility Fog Halbonaut
ocr.description: A shape-shifting flux-pinned network of nanobots under the control of a Turing CPU.
ocr.ability: All of your stacks are Glitch-free.

spreadsheet.future: UPLIFT FUTURE: Req = Robots not Emancipated, Human at a promoted Bernal & spend 20 Aqua. Effects = Every Robot becomes Emancipated, Casus belli for War, 12 VP.

ocr.name: Group Mind Immortalists
ocr.description: When the Global Brain leads to universal intelligence, reduced aging, and an immortal techno-society as neurons of a benign death.
ocr.ability: May perform the faction privileges on both sides of your Crew card.

spreadsheet.future: PAN SAPIENS FUTURE: Req = Have 3 Factories connected to Space Elevators. Effect = Casus belli for War. (Endgame) +2 VP for each glory chit owned.

ocr.name: Biomechs
ocr.description: Biomechatronics integrates biology, mechanics, and electronics for improved respiration, vision, metabolism, and artificial limbs.

ocr.name: Soldier Caste
ocr.description: The military arm of the current polity.
ocr.ability: All your Humans can commit Felonies, even if defending Humans are present.

spreadsheet.future: SECESSION FUTURE: Req = 2 Promoted Human Colonists at an Anchored Bernal with Dirtside 5+. Effects = Casus belli for War, 10 VP.

ocr.name: Botany Bay Convicts
ocr.description: The New Botany Bay Penal Colony is the answer to severe labor shortages in space.

ocr.name: Martian Assembly
ocr.description: Government based on Mars which builds space elevators.
ocr.ability: Acts as a Freighter when building a Space Elevator.

spreadsheet.future: BEANSTALK FUTURE: Req = Have 3+ Space Elevators built by any player. Effect (Endgame) = +3 VP for each Factory connected to a Space Elevator.

ocr.name: Boyle Engineering Collective
ocr.description: Mars Nativism protects the rights of the First Hundred and native-born against those born on Earth.

ocr.name: Wet-Nano Seed Sail
ocr.description: Precision biomimetic nano-technology (wet nano) builds any artifacts materials along with complex carbohydrates.
ocr.ability: -2 to Colocated size rolls on Synodic Comets. Can't enter aerobrakes.

spreadsheet.future: NEW VENUS FUTURE: Req = Decommission operational 7+ net thrust thruster on industrialized Synodic Comet (yours). 12 VP + (Endgame) remove all tokens on Venus & comet.

ocr.name: Calypso 2 Seed Sail
ocr.description: Named after the legendary oceanographic research vessel used by Jacques-Ives Cousteau. A closed eco-system allows low mass. Its mission is to spread life to other worlds.
ocr.ability: Can't enter aerobrakes.

ocr.name: New Attica Secessionists
ocr.description: Demanding Earth isn't rule it dynamically, the secessionists threaten space-based reprisals to gain independence.
ocr.ability: Boost costs are doubled for all your opponents.

spreadsheet.future: SECESSION FUTURE: Req = 2 Promoted Human Colonists at a promoted Anchored Bernal. Effects = Casus belli for War, 7 VP.

ocr.name: Heavy Water Survivalists
ocr.description: Libertarians, survivalists, and doomsayers convinced that the Earth is kaput. They drink heavy water (D2O) to improve radiation resistance.

ocr.name: Iceworms
ocr.description: Iceworms are skilled at tunneling through ice, and live in submarine colonies in Outer Solar.
ocr.ability: Performs epic hazard operation as a free action, & is not Decommissioned if it fails.

spreadsheet.future: SUBMARINER FUTURE: Req = Build 3 Submarines. Effect = Doubles your dirtside hydration, not cumulative with other modifiers.

ocr.name: House of Saud
ocr.description: The ruling royal family of Saudi Arabia is the richest dynasty in history.

ocr.name: Rental Body Guild
ocr.description: Guild members teleuperate rented bodies while their actual bodies are in quiescent nearby.
ocr.ability: -1 to Colocated size rolls.

spreadsheet.future: ET LIFE FUTURE: Req = Have 2 or more Astrobiological Colonies. Effect (Endgame): +2 VP per Astrobiological Colony.

ocr.name: Juiced Cosmonauts
ocr.description: Drugs hold against the harsh conditions.

ocr.name: Svalbard Caretakers
ocr.description: Taking the long road to the future, only tech caretakers will industrialized by any player.
ocr.ability: -1 on all size rolls when prospecting Synodic Sites.

spreadsheet.future: DYSON BUBBLE FUTURE: Req = Both Sites of Mercury industrialized by any player. Effects = 5 VP per Factory owned on Mercury.

ocr.name: Lloyd's Salvage Co.
ocr.description: Policy of replacing corporate transactions with individual ones, enabled by reputation tracking and easily-created microsatellite infrastructure.

ocr.name: Renaissance Man
ocr.description: A renaissance man is a wearer of varied talents and learning.
ocr.ability: If initiating a research auction, can search through one patent deck and choose the card to be auctioned.

spreadsheet.future: ARTIFICIAL CONSCIOUSNESS FUTURE: Req = 2 promoted Colonists at an Astrobiology Dirtside. Effects = May free market any number of cards, 10 VP.

ocr.name: Malcolm
ocr.description: An eccentric tycoon determined to make his mark in the High Frontier.

ocr.name: Blue Goo Sybonts
ocr.description: A hybrid body is enriched with organisms, synthetic plasma, bacteria, and a bio-based system called blue goo.
ocr.ability: Can produce ET products of Spectral Type C at any Factory.

spreadsheet.future: SETI FUTURE: Req = Industrialize 2 Jovian Tojans, 1 each in the Greek & Trojan camps. Effects = As a free action perform 1 inspiration + 1 homestead, 10 VP.

ocr.name: Microgravity Pantrophists
ocr.description: Pantropy is the practice of adapting to an environment rather than altering it, by use of gene-spliced biological symbionts.

ocr.name: Programmable Matter
ocr.description: Changes its physical properties (shape, density, moduli, conductivity, or optical properties) in accordance with autonomous programming.

ocr.name: Neumann Matter
ocr.description: Neumanns are reprogrammable programmable matter. Each manipulator arm launches of microscopic Van Neumann free.
ocr.ability: All of your stacks are Glitch-free.

spreadsheet.future: UPLIFT FUTURE: Req = Robots not Emancipated, Human at a promoted Bernal & spend 20 Aqua. Effects = Every Robot becomes Emancipated, Casus belli for War, 12 VP.

ocr.name: Alchemist Aviatrices
ocr.description: Carrier skycyclists use electromagnets to purify the reagents & isotopes required for rockets.
ocr.ability: During Factory Refuel, double the amount of isotope fuel.

spreadsheet.future: AEROSTAT FUTURE: Req = Promoted Bernal with Aerostat Dirtside. Effects = Can homestead as a free action, 14 VP.

ocr.name: Rock Rats Miners' Union
ocr.description: Human-cobot teams optimize productivity in extreme conditions, including weightlessness and low gravity.

ocr.name: Security System
ocr.description: Provides collision protection using radar-guided lasers that nudge incoming debris off course.

ocr.name: Frankenstein Navigator
ocr.description: A digital navigator combines the advantages of a digital mind with the self-repair and reproductive-reality of a humanoid.
ocr.ability: FINAO costs are halved (drop fractions).

spreadsheet.future: UPLIFT FUTURE: Req = Robots not Emancipated, Human at a promoted Bernal & spend 20 Aqua. Effects = Every Robot becomes Emancipated, Casus belli for War, 12 VP.

ocr.name: Josephson Implants
ocr.description: Hackers implanted with flux quantum superconducting quantum computers are the result of a secret KSS project.
ocr.ability: FINAO costs are halved (drop fractions).

spreadsheet.future: SUPREME CULT FUTURE: Req = Active Law in authority. Effects (Module 0) = May lobby w/o removing the delegate used. All Seniority Disks migrate to authority. (Endgame): 10 VP.

ocr.name: Siren Cybernautics Inc.
ocr.description: Space-hardened radiation and bone atrophy, the space employees of Siren Cybernautics live in the Trojans using high-oxygen PFCs, breathing with liquid-filled lungs.

ocr.name: Smart Pets
ocr.description: Lab animals enhanced with brain-computer interface technology. This device can be 3D-printed & applied to any lab rat to make it into a work animal.

ocr.name: Creeper Neogen
ocr.description: Crawling creeper genes form a chimera of invertebrate DNA. Fully biological, organs and able to reproduce like any other organism.
ocr.ability: All of your stacks are Glitch-free.

spreadsheet.future: UPLIFT FUTURE: Req = Robots not Emancipated, Human at a promoted Bernal & spend 20 Aqua. Effects = Every Robot becomes Emancipated, Casus belli for War, 12 VP.

ocr.name: Kaluga Naniteers
ocr.description: An engineering discipline skilled in nanobots and nanocables composed of graphenecarbon Tsiolkovsky's hermitage.
ocr.ability: Your Aqua from a Free Market is doubled.

spreadsheet.future: TNO FUTURE: Req = Industrialize 2 Sites in the Neptune Zone. Effects = Can homestead as a free action, 12 VP.

ocr.name: Transorbital Railworkers
ocr.description: Started from a small federally-subsidized launching operation, which boasts years in LEO and has become payload space between cislunar space.

ocr.name: Eugenic Pilgrims
ocr.description: We regard tinkering with the God-given genome as singerant a corruption. We offer ourselves the old-fashioned way, by controlled breeding.
ocr.ability: Faction privilege not lost in Anarchy. -1 to Colocated size rolls on Synodic Comets.

spreadsheet.future: FOOTFALL FUTURE: Req = Decommission operational 7+ net thrust thruster on Industrialized Synodic Comet (yours). Effects = 10 VP + Casus belli. (Endgame) All tokens on the comet eliminated.

ocr.name: Vatican Observers
ocr.description: In the tradition of the Forbidden Observatory, it is the Vatican's attempt to oversee the direction of technology and science.

ocr.name: Beowulf Internet
ocr.description: The woodcarved network of mass-produced networked computer nodes, each one dumber than a smartphone, but in vast communication delays hindered by interplanetary comm.

ocr.name: Grendel
ocr.description: In Beowulf legend, Grendel is a monstrous shadow-walker who menaces those who travel between Heorots.

ocr.name: Combat Quadrupeds
ocr.description: Weaponized patrol the perimeters of human settlements, our bots have highly agile and specialized terrain.

ocr.name: Lernaean Warbots
ocr.description: Biomechanically weaponized robots, bio-hardened being fight with no vital spots.

ocr.name: Nano-3D Printers
ocr.description: With a sufficiently microscopic precision, 3D-printers assemble complex or exotic structures at a nanoscale level of detail.

ocr.name: Offworld Replicators
ocr.description: Can reproduce autonomously by extracting & manipulating the plastics and assemblies necessary to duplicate itself.

ocr.name: Apex Algorithms
ocr.description: With artificial singularity attained the technology, growth of exponential power begins to grow.

ocr.name: Self-designing Heuristics
ocr.description: With the help of heuristics or rules of thumb & genetic algorithms and real-time inference, it is possible to imbue machinery with a source code able to adapt to uncodified designs.

ocr.name: Cobots
ocr.description: Intelligent humaniform robots optimized to collaborate with humans. Includes a level of collective mind underpinned by IoT.

ocr.name: Singularity
ocr.description: With significantly, more powerful than human language, could an algorithm capable of self-deep learning lead to an intelligence that can evolve self-interests?

ocr.name: Sensor Web Sail
ocr.description: A mesh of flex-wires with sensors and power cells to the mesh spacing.

ocr.name: Wisp
ocr.description: With a sufficiently microscopic precision, space solar array can be printed with nano-layers.

ocr.name: Inner Tour
ocr.destination: Enter 4 different flyby Spaces in the same Turn.
ocr.fulfilledAbility: when entering Aerobrake Hazards leading to LEO.
ocr.flavorText: Using flybys, it is possible to see a great deal of the inner system in a short period of time.

ocr.name: Grand Tour
ocr.destination: Enter 2 flyby Spaces beyond Ceres zone in the same Turn.
ocr.flavorText: The Grand Tour was the mission of Voyager 2 visiting the giant planets using slingshots.

ocr.name: Vanity Project
ocr.destination: Enter any Inner Moon or Helion Return (7G/0G).
ocr.flavorText: The very silly, especially a very rich silly, like to fly in the face of danger.

ocr.name: Extreme Sports
ocr.destination: Enter any Moon in a hazard zone with a Torch Engine and 3 G-hours of burns in the same Turn.
ocr.flavorText: The very geeky and very rich are willing to pay big bucks for playing ships on dangerous fly-bys.

ocr.name: Fugitive
ocr.destination: Enter any ET Colony when your Faction suffers Anarchy.
ocr.flavorText: Independent digital colonies allow a person's consciousness to exist and be propagated despite poor local governance.

ocr.name: Refugees
ocr.flavorText: Humanitarian groups are willing to pay top dollar to save people not served by the current governance system.

ocr.name: Chiron Quest
ocr.flavorText: Named after a gentle centaur in Greek mythology, Chiron circles between Saturn and Uranus and is potentially covered with tarry hydrocarbons.

ocr.name: Cen Tour
ocr.flavorText: Chiron is a comet also classified as a Centaur, for its halfway distance between Jupiter and Neptune.

ocr.name: Hubris
ocr.flavorText: Although humans have successfully manufactured an environment where one can live in space, arrogance and overconfidence could result in catastrophic system failure.

ocr.name: Fulgurite Hunt
ocr.destination: Enter any Site, Prospect or Factory (>=50 mbar).
ocr.flavorText: Obsessed traveler is willing to pay top dollar to acquire pieces of glass forged by lightning strikes.

ocr.name: Comet Adventure
ocr.flavorText: The highly textured world, looking more like a loose collection of rocks than a single coherent rock, has much popular to the fringe communities.

ocr.name: Pleasure Garden
ocr.destination: Enter any Site beyond Ceres zone.
ocr.flavorText: Pornography exists, but mostly in virtual space and is big business. Outer sites that create real porn can make good revenue at the right buyers.

ocr.name: Robotic Facility
ocr.flavorText: The space environment is ideal for complex robots. Vacuum keeps them clean and slow spin keeps the facility organized.

ocr.name: Goo Spores
ocr.destination: When Fulfilling, must dismantle a bug.
ocr.flavorText: A gray-goo catastrophe just occurred, and gray-goo spores were ejected beyond the solar system, leaving more spores for research.

ocr.name: Artemis
ocr.fulfilledAbility: You may prospect Luna without performing a boost for 1st player.
ocr.flavorText: Artemis was the goddess of wild animals and hunt and was often identified with the moon. Her legacy continues in modern times through NASA's project.

ocr.name: HAVOC
ocr.destination: Enter any Ice or Water Moon (7.00-9.99).
ocr.flavorText: HAVOC was designed by NASA's Langley Research Center, using dirigibles in Venus's atmosphere where pressure and temperature are more Earth-like.

ocr.name: New Horizons
ocr.flavorText: The famous New Horizons probe traveled 9 years without stopping. This mission goes to Kuiper Belt at a leisure pace and pays for those that visit.

ocr.name: Home on Lagrange
ocr.destination: Your Anchored Bernal not in Venus/Earth/Mars zones.
ocr.flavorText: The artificial gravity and cave-like surface of a rotating space station are the best conditions of a safe area to live in space and give birth to children.

ocr.name: Mars Polar Walk
ocr.destination: Enter North or South Axial Return (7.5-8.0).
ocr.flavorText: The North polar ice of Mars extends down to about 45 degrees and is about 2 km. Axial Returns can reach for either pole.

ocr.name: ET Holy Grail
ocr.flavorText: Be the first agent to go where no one has explored before.

ocr.name: Closest Planet
ocr.flavorText: Settled in the closest planet from the Sun, Mercury is slightly larger than our Moon. It has both the densest and hottest rocks in the Solar System.

ocr.name: Highest Cliff
ocr.flavorText: The Verona Rupes on Miranda in the Uranus system is the tallest cliff in the solar system. The 20 km cliff offers one of the best bungee jumping and climbing opportunities.

ocr.name: Fool's Gold
ocr.flavorText: A failure in communications makes a trillionaire believe there is a secret motherlode at a comet rendezvous.

ocr.name: Rivalry
ocr.destination: Highest Glory chits in hand (of any player).
ocr.fulfilledAbility: Gain 1 additional Aqua when fulfilling Contracts.
ocr.flavorText: The celebrity factor of glory chits is enough to satiate this trillionaire with no shortage of money.

ocr.name: Mercury Forge
ocr.flavorText: A network of manufacturing plants powered by ISRU-extracted Thorium, provides necessary infrastructure for deep space craft assembly and equipment manufacture.

ocr.name: Topographic Ocean
ocr.fulfilledAbility: Gain 4 Aquas when any Colony & Refinery there are built.
ocr.flavorText: Sublimated vapors burst through recently sealed crevasses in an expanse not only of mountains and valleys but towers and terraces reaching high into the tenuous atmosphere.

ocr.name: Plasma Intrusion Laboratory
ocr.fulfilledAbility: +1 flyby bonus from Radiation Ray Gun once/Turn (total +3).
ocr.flavorText: The Io Torus, or the Io Plasma Torus, is a large torus plasma ring near Jupiter's equator associated with volcanic emissions from the moon Io.

ocr.name: Triggered Decay Positrons
ocr.fulfilledAbility: +1 flyby bonus from Radiation Ray Gun once/Turn.
ocr.flavorText: The triggered release of ions, protons, electrons or positrons (anti-electrons) is a catalytic nuclear reaction.

ocr.name: Hexapod Explorer
ocr.flavorText: A rover with a hexapod multi-legged frame, enables the negotiation of boulders and ridges more efficiently than wheels and provides greater overall stability.

ocr.name: Amalthea Halbonaut
ocr.flavorText: Amalthea is the most radiation intense body in the solar system. Heavy ion flux, but also includes low energy electrons and positrons.

ocr.name: Equatorial Launch Railway
ocr.fulfilledAbility: Acetylene reprocessing lifts all ET Tokens to your Factories.
ocr.flavorText: A rail track parallel to the celestial equator. Vehicles on the track, may become orbital velocity to the atmosphere and beyond.

ocr.name: Fullerene Cable Spinner
ocr.flavorText: Manufacturing facility to produce cables composed of buckminster fullerene (buckyballs) and carbon nanotubes that make incredibly strong cables.

ocr.name: Solar Observatory
ocr.flavorText: Sun-diver and circumsolar study. Helioseismology & photosphere evolution and coronal heating.

name: Science Golden Apples Of The Sun

ocr.name: Golden Apples of the Sun
ocr.flavorText: The outermost sublayer of field-shift and is uniform with Earth's, and lies deep in the photosphere.

ocr.name: Largest Object
ocr.flavorText: After an unexpected mega outburst of vapor, the Dawn orbiter's camera system observed bright spots on the surface. Ceres is the largest object in the Asteroid Belt.

ocr.name: Cyborg Transhumans
ocr.flavorText: Mind to cybernetic unified systems. Human + machine intelligence. Cybernetic organisms are sentient without the limitations of a traditional human form.

ocr.name: Submersible Prospector
ocr.flavorText: Explore the depth and likely tidal-powered hydrothermal vents. High degree of automation, precision sensors, mapping technology.

ocr.name: Goldilocks Luna Terraform
ocr.fulfilledAbility: You do not need to promote to build Colonies & Factories on Luna.
ocr.flavorText: Ultra-thin aluminized Mylar/Kapton floated between Luna-Sol to provide shielding.

ocr.name: Beehive
ocr.destination: Aldrin Cycler via Buzz of Humankind
ocr.flavorText: After production of this project deliver the disk projects Swarmfaring, Photon Recycler or Solar Moth.

ocr.name: Ring Industrialization
ocr.destination: Saturn (RAD S Site on any Sat. Turn)
ocr.fulfilledAbility: ring - your Mobile Factories on each WT count as Factories.
ocr.flavorText: Manufacturing in micro/zero-G on Saturn's Rings is not on solid ground but on floating particle rafts.

ocr.name: Sun-fired Laser
ocr.flavorText: A multi-thermal-terawatt laser-relay capable of propelling solar sail vehicles.

ocr.name: Daedalus Starship Research
ocr.flavorText: Even proper advanced designs are thousands of times more massive than current technology, rely on unproven physics.

ocr.name: Green Magnetosphere
ocr.flavorText: A Green power station utilizing the planet's natural magnetic field. A current flows through the electrical infrastructure.

ocr.name: Ice Phase Research
ocr.flavorText: The Quaoar/Weywot system has crystalline ice in contrast to most KBO have amorphous ice.

ocr.name: Aerover Blimp Explorer
ocr.flavorText: Reconnaissance blimp can negotiate/maneuver atmospheric conditions better than free-flying buoyant balloons.

ocr.name: Nuclear Electric Airship
ocr.flavorText: This reconnaissance airship may remain aloft for weeks or months at a time, has high maneuverability.

ocr.name: Mosquito
ocr.flavorText: Low-cost, lightweight, minimalist Martian explorer designed to venture into hard-to-access terrain.

ocr.name: Solar Nebula Mafics
ocr.flavorText: Phoebe, likely a TNO interloper, is second only to Earth in compositional diversity.

ocr.name: Planetary Protection
ocr.requirements: When Fulfilling: Discard a space up to 3 steps away.
ocr.flavorText: Careful flag contaminated ISRU technology and site a Robonaut there to bring it up to code.

ocr.name: Planetary Rail Network
ocr.destination: Colonized Buoyant (M, N or V) colony (no Io)
ocr.flavorText: Rails can be established and maintained more easily on planets with no atmosphere to corrode them and low gravity.

ocr.name: Bio-Inspired Rover
ocr.flavorText: A bio-inspired rover must explore a world of interest to explore life origins instead of explore for minerals.

ocr.name: Subnubilar Zeppelin
ocr.flavorText: Arccloud expansions under the Venus or Neptune clouds create an environment for long-term missions.

ocr.name: Junket
ocr.flavorText: A publicity only political or promotional site to bring the public or media up to the colony.

ocr.name: Spaceborn Political Rally
ocr.requirements: When Fulfilling: Discard a Political card.
ocr.flavorText: A political rally organized from Earth to free space with tunnel pads and burrows.

ocr.name: Drug Smuggling
ocr.requirements: When Fulfilling: Discard any 3 cards from hand.
ocr.flavorText: Illegal drugs, vaccine and life-extension therapies are produced at bioengineering colonies through the use of unique microgravity or exotic environments.

ocr.name: Chipjack
ocr.destination: Colonized with a 'Bernal' anywhere and beyond Ceres
ocr.fulfilledAbility: You may perform instant Operations on a Bernal even if occupied by others.
ocr.flavorText: Infiltrate and steal secret or proprietary documents and technology files.

ocr.name: Cancer Research Mission
ocr.flavorText: Allow humans harvesting an unshielded cycler station or interlude with no other life within a few years and return with samples.

ocr.name: Trojan Listening Posts
ocr.flavorText: An observatory placed in orbit around or near a Trojan asteroid could provide years of careful scrutiny of deep space operations while hiding in a swarm.

ocr.name: Rescue Team
ocr.flavorText: Investigate loss of life at a now-derelict spacecraft or colony. Discover signs of rebellion.

ocr.name: Mercury Sunset Convoy
ocr.destination: Colonized M Colony with Mobility (Operational or Outpost)
ocr.flavorText: Given Mercury's slow orbit this means a very long journey, one that few others can do.

ocr.name: SWIV Miner
ocr.flavorText: Prevent ongoing asteroid or comet mining by claiming their next likely collected and mined target.

ocr.name: Refueling Trawler
ocr.flavorText: Provide loiter positions for craft refueling or maintenance to provide deep space presence.

ocr.name: Tsiolkovsky Elevator Lab
ocr.fulfilledAbility: Your factory-assist Encrustation cannot be Encrusted at other Elevator as normal burn spaces at Earth Spaces.
ocr.flavorText: Building a working space elevator would be enormously expensive and this research could lead the way.

ocr.name: Skyhook
ocr.destination: Your Factory Site at one end of a Space Elevator icon.
ocr.requirements: When Fulfilling: Build a Space Elevator at this Site (no Hazard Roll).
ocr.flavorText: A rotating tether in low orbit can boost payloads via momentum transfer.

ocr.name: Spin Control
ocr.flavorText: Working out issues on these contact binary anomalies is excellent research for future asteroid deflections.

ocr.name: Ring Rain
ocr.flavorText: The ring of giant planets are resupplied by constant impacts on small shepherd moons and meteoroid bombardment.

name: Government Grant Search For Life Center

ocr.name: Search for Life Center
ocr.flavorText: Classify the origin of synthesized life to use, an attempt to achieve, and perhaps replicate abiogenesis.

ocr.name: Sunrise Project
ocr.flavorText: The industrial revolution happened alongside fossil fuel revolution. Why can we not similarly do the same with solar magnetic power?

ocr.name: Yarkovsky Research
ocr.flavorText: The Yarkovsky effect sets small asteroids spiraling inward or outward, changing projected impact targets by centuries.

ocr.name: Deep Space One
ocr.flavorText: Uranus is the easiest source for bulk quantities of He-3, nitrogen, and carbon - all in high demand on Earth.

ocr.name: Hardened Base
ocr.flavorText: A heavily-shielded, armor-hardened base typically designed for extended operations in hostile environments.

ocr.name: Classified Security Payload
ocr.flavorText: [REDACTED]

ocr.fulfilledAbility: You may use Claim disks as delegates.
ocr.whenFulfilling: Gain 3 Isotopes at this Site; place 2 delegates on any 1 Ideology.
ocr.flavorText: Choosing a starship thruster is a one-time decision of tremendous importance.

ocr.name: Radiation Shield Prototype
ocr.destination: Mercury Site (0.630), then enter 2 Radiation Belt Spaces in the Saturn zone or beyond & Return.
ocr.fulfilledAbility: Your Stacks are immune to Belt CME Rolls.
ocr.flavorText: Radiation levels for Project Exodus require new passive systems for cryo-protection and shielding.

ocr.name: Rival Isobank
ocr.fulfilledAbility: You may exchange 1 Isotope per Turn at your Anchored non-Home Bernal for 6 Aquas.
ocr.flavorText: There will be a single centralized location for all Exomigration Isotopes. Unless there are two...

ocr.name: TW Stress Test
ocr.destination: Enter Solar Oberth, then Synodic Site, & Return.
ocr.fulfilledAbility: Your GW/TW thruster receives a Bonus Pivot.
ocr.flavorText: Starship thrusters will need to be for long duty cycles under difficult circumstances after planned or unplanned inactivity.

ocr.name: Iso-Exchange
ocr.fulfilledAbility: Produce your isostandard during a site refuel op at any Factory (with permission).
ocr.flavorText: Managing the exchange of different isotopes types is more profitable than mining it.

ocr.name: Deep Freeze
ocr.fulfilledAbility: Before exomigrating, you may Discard the top card from the queue you are drawing from.
ocr.flavorText: Cryogenic techniques can preserve the genome of a species at near absolute zero.

ocr.name: Atmospheric Iso-Refinery
ocr.fulfilledAbility: If your GW/TW thruster ends its move on an Aerobrake Hazard, that Stack gains 1 isotope.
ocr.flavorText: Atmospheric scooping can process vast volumes to find trace isotopes useful as fuel.
